message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this incredible product to you. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly valuable. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1000000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's worth to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $950000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $920000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your desire to save some money, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $920000. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm counteroffering at $930000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $910000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $910000. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering at $915000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering at $905000. This is as low as I'm willing to go. I believe this is still a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I understand you're getting close to your minimum acceptable price, but I'm still not willing to pay more than $900000. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to accept it, I'll consider buying the product from John for $1200000.
